title: Operation Venus
creator_credit: Alvin Yudkoff and Paramount Educational Services Division
brief_description: This film documents one of the first telephone “hot-lines” for teenagers by teenagers concerning venereal disease. The message is “Trust us. Call us. We will help you with understanding, in confidence”. Emphasises the importance of being responsible, the value of being educated and the rewards of honesty.
